mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(board_no, title, content, writer) VALUES(board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: SELECT board_no, title, content, writer, reg_date FROM (select board_no, title, content, writer, reg_date, rownum as rnum from board) where rnum between #{sizePerPage}*#{page}-9 and #{sizePerPage}*#{page} ORDER BY board_no DESC, reg_date DESC
SELECT board_no, title, content, writer, reg_date FROM board WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title =#{title}, content =#{content} WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT count(board_no) FROM board WHERE board_no > 0
